blogPost.excerpt: Use https://pudding.ai/ for real-time ad creative analysis to maximize your campaign ROI and work efficiency. Get actionable, data-driven AI insights 💡 for all your ad creatives and bridge the gap by ensuring great communication between your creative & media teams.
blogPost.body: Use https://pudding.ai/ for real-time ad creative analysis to maximize your campaign ROI and work efficiency. Get actionable, data-driven AI insights 💡 for all your ad creatives and bridge the gap by ensuring great communication between your creative & media teams.
blogPost.title: Pudding.ai - Real-time feedback for your ad creatives
blogPost.author: Dina Taitelbaum

localize.description: 使用https://pudding.ai/，进行实时广告创意分析，以最大限度地提高您的广告活动投资回报率和工作效率。为您的所有广告创意获取可操作的、数据驱动的AI洞察力💡，并通过确保您的创意和媒体团队之间的巨大沟通来弥补差距。
localize.tagline: 为您的广告创意提供实时反馈

localize.description: 使用https://pudding.ai/，進行實時廣告創意分析，以最大限度地提高您的廣告活動投資回報率和工作效率。爲您的所有廣告創意獲取可操作的、數據驅動的AI洞察力💡，並通過確保您的創意和媒體團隊之間的巨大溝通來彌補差距。
localize.tagline: 爲您的廣告創意提供實時反饋

previous.excerpt: Pickle helps companies understand every phone and video conversation they have with their customers. We do this by automatically transcribing calls and extracting key insights, questions, and trends.
previous.title: Pickle - Transcribe and analyze phone and video conversations

localize.description: Pickle帮助企业了解他们与客户的每一次电话和视频对话。我们通过自动转录电话并提取关键见解、问题和趋势来实现这一目标。
localize.tagline: 抄录和分析电话和视频对话。

localize.description: Pickle幫助企業瞭解他們與客戶的每一次電話和視頻對話。我們通過自動轉錄電話並提取關鍵見解、問題和趨勢來實現這一目標。
localize.tagline: 抄錄和分析電話和視頻對話。
